text:
Can anyone tell me how to customise the fields in a registration template so that I can ask for more info such as phone first name last name etc. the boilerplate has the following
```{% member_register 'my_register'
          email_label='Email',
          password_confirm_label='Confirm Password',
          password_label='Password',
          submit_button_text='Save Password'
        %}```

Hello, everybody!

I'm currently working on the HubSpot CMS and have the challenge of being able to do an internal page categorization like the example of <https://www.HubSpot.com/sell-from-anywhere>

Could you guide me as I could do without being a blog template?

Thanks for that input. That explains somethings that I've experienced. It probably explains why the old module code doesn't break the current production site (but does when I re-create the page in sandbox)
